name: NSCollectionLayoutVisibleItem
desc: An item that's currently visible within the bounds of a section.

items.name: var representedElementKind: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the type of item.

items.name: var representedElementCategory: UICollectionView.ElementCategory
items.desc: A category that identifies the item, such as decoration or supplementary view.

items.name: var indexPath: IndexPath
items.desc: The index path of the item.

items.name: var isHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the item is hidden.

items.name: var frame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame rectangle, which describes the item's location and size in its section's coordinate system.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: The bounds rectangle, which describes the item's location and size in its own coordinate system.

items.name: var center: CGPoint
items.desc: The center point of the item's frame rectangle.

items.name: var transform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: The transform applied to the item, relative to the center of its bounds.

items.name: var transform3D: CATransform3D
items.desc: The 3D transform applied to the item.

items.name: var zIndex: Int
items.desc: The vertical stacking order of the item in relation to other items in the section.
